name: SENTINELONE [Suspicious Threat - <%= threat %>]
description: This rule looks for SentinelOne alerts for threats with suspicious confidence.

name: SENTINELONE [Malicious Threat - <%= threat %>]
description: This rule looks for SentinelOne alerts for threats with malicious confidence.

name: SENTINELONE [<%= confidence %> STAR Alert - <%= rule %>]
description: This rule triggers on SentinelOne Storyline Active Response (STAR) alerts with low severity value.

name: SENTINELONE [<%= confidence %> STAR Alert - <%= rule %>]
description: This rule triggers on SentinelOne Storyline Active Response (STAR) alerts with medium severity value.

name: SENTINELONE [<%= confidence %> STAR Alert - <%= rule %>]
description: This rule triggers on SentinelOne Storyline Active Response (STAR) alerts with high severity value.

name: SENTINELONE [<%= confidence %> STAR Alert - <%= rule %>]
description: This rule triggers on SentinelOne Storyline Active Response (STAR) alerts with critical severity value.
